songs.title: Medieval Cathedral
songs.author: audial-preset
songs.snippet:
setcpm(50)

// organ drone
$: note("<[d2,a2,d3] [c2,g2,c3] [bb1,f2,bb2] [c2,g2,c3]>")
  .s("sawtooth")
  .lpf(400)
  .gain(0.25)
  .slow(4)
  .room(0.8)

// high overtones
$: note("d5 ~ ~ a5 ~ ~ f5 ~ ~ g5 ~ ~")
  .s("sine")
  .gain(0.1)
  .delay(0.5)
  .room(0.9)
  .slow(3)

// bell
$: note("d6 ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~")
  .s("sine")
  .gain(0.08)
  .room(0.95)
  .delay(0.7)
  .slow(4)

// sub bass
$: note("d2 ~ ~ ~ c2 ~ ~ ~ bb1 ~ ~ ~ c2 ~ ~ ~")
  .s("sine")
  .lpf(120)
  .gain(0.3)
  .slow(4)

songs.title: Ancient Ruins
songs.author: audial-preset
songs.snippet:
setcpm(40)

// wind drone
$: note("<[e3,b3] [d3,a3] [e3,b3] [f#3,c#4]>")
  .s("sawtooth")
  .lpf(600)
  .gain(0.15)
  .slow(4)
  .room(0.7)

// metallic resonance
$: note("e5 ~ ~ ~ ~ b5 ~ ~ ~ ~ g5 ~ ~ ~ ~ ~")
  .s("triangle")
  .gain(0.08)
  .delay(0.6)
  .room(0.85)
  .slow(3)

// sparse percussion
$: s("~ ~ hh ~ ~ ~ hh ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ hh ~ ~")
  .gain(0.12)
  .lpf(3000)
  .room(0.6)
  .slow(2)

// deep earth hum
$: note("e2")
  .s("sine")
  .lpf(100)
  .gain(0.2)
  .slow(8)

songs.title: Renaissance Court
songs.author: audial-preset
songs.snippet:
setcpm(72)

// plucked strings
$: note("[g4 b4 d5] [a4 c5 e5] [f#4 a4 d5] [g4 b4 d5]")
  .s("triangle")
  .gain(0.2)
  .delay(0.2)
  .room(0.4)
  .slow(2)

// bass movement
$: note("g3 ~ d3 ~ a3 ~ d3 ~ f#3 ~ d3 ~ g3 ~ d3 ~")
  .s("sawtooth")
  .lpf(500)
  .gain(0.25)
  .slow(2)

// melodic ornament
$: note("~ d5 ~ g5 ~ b5 ~ a5 ~ ~ d5 ~ f#5 ~ ~ ~")
  .s("sine")
  .gain(0.12)
  .delay(0.3)
  .room(0.5)
  .slow(2)

// gentle pulse
$: s("~ ~ bd ~ ~ ~ ~ ~")
  .gain(0.15)
  .lpf(200)
  .room(0.3)

songs.title: Gothic Horror
songs.author: audial-preset
songs.snippet:
setcpm(55)

// dissonant cluster
$: note("<[c3,f#3,b3] [db3,g3,c4] [c3,gb3,bb3] [d3,ab3,c4]>")
  .s("sawtooth")
  .lpf(700)
  .gain(0.2)
  .slow(4)
  .room(0.85)

// high tension
$: note("b5 ~ c6 ~ ~ ~ bb5 ~ ~ ~ c6 ~ ~ ~ ~ ~")
  .s("square")
  .lpf(2000)
  .gain(0.06)
  .delay(0.7)
  .room(0.9)
  .slow(3)

// heartbeat
$: s("bd ~ ~ ~ ~ bd ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ bd ~ ~")
  .gain(0.3)
  .lpf(80)
  .room(0.4)
  .slow(2)

// distant screech
$: note("~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ c7")
  .s("sawtooth")
  .lpf(6000)
  .hpf(2000)
  .gain(0.04)
  .delay(0.8)
  .room(0.95)
  .slow(8)

songs.title: Impressionist Garden
songs.author: audial-preset
songs.snippet:
setcpm(80)

// soft arpeggios
$: note("[c4 e4 g4 b4] [d4 f4 a4 c5] [e4 g4 b4 d5] [f4 a4 c5 e5]")
  .s("sine")
  .gain(0.15)
  .delay(0.3)
  .room(0.5)
  .slow(2)

// pad
$: note("<[c3,e3,g3,b3] [d3,f3,a3,c4] [e3,g3,b3] [f3,a3,c4]>")
  .s("sawtooth")
  .lpf(900)
  .gain(0.18)
  .slow(4)
  .room(0.4)

// melody fragments
$: note("~ g5 ~ ~ e5 ~ ~ ~ b5 ~ ~ ~ c5 ~ ~ ~")
  .s("sine")
  .gain(0.1)
  .delay(0.4)
  .room(0.6)
  .slow(2)

// bass
$: note("c3 ~ ~ ~ d3 ~ ~ ~ e3 ~ ~ ~ f3 ~ ~ ~")
  .s("sine")
  .lpf(250)
  .gain(0.2)
  .slow(4)

songs.title: War Drums
songs.author: audial-preset
songs.snippet:
setcpm(100)

// war drums
$: s("bd bd ~ bd ~ bd bd ~ bd ~ ~ bd ~ bd bd ~")
  .gain(0.4)
  .lpf(200)
  .room(0.3)

// snare rolls
$: s("~ ~ ~ ~ sn ~ ~ sn ~ ~ sn ~ ~ ~ sn:2 ~")
  .gain(0.25)
  .lpf(4000)
  .room(0.2)

// horn call
$: note("<[d4,a4] ~ ~ ~ [c4,g4] ~ ~ ~ [d4,a4] ~ [e4,b4] ~ [d4,a4] ~ ~ ~>")
  .s("sawtooth")
  .lpf(1200)
  .gain(0.2)
  .slow(2)
  .room(0.4)

// sub bass
$: note("d2 ~ d2 ~ ~ d2 ~ ~ d2 ~ ~ ~ d2 d2 ~ ~")
  .s("sine")
  .lpf(80)
  .gain(0.35)

// cymbal crashes
$: s("~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ oh ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~")
  .gain(0.15)
  .lpf(6000)
  .room(0.5)
